venue.address_1: Kelly Stand parking area. The road will turn to a dirt road. Soon thereafter, the Long/Appalachian trailhead will be on your ri
venue.name: Stratton Mountain Trailhead

item.description:
Snow shoe to the summit of Stratton Mtn via the Long Trail from the Kelley Stand Rd - 8 miles, though if the weather is not good we may turn around at a viewpoint for 6 miles total -

meet at Marge's house at 08:00am to car pool or at the Kelley Stand parking lot at 0900

Hike is basically in the woods, with the only exposed parts being on the two ski trails - gear would be snowshoes and poles and appropriately filled winter packs, no special technical skills needed

for more info and to sign up people can email Marge
item.name: Snow shoe Stratton Mountain 8 mile All Ages!
